pr_title: Allow running the Docker image with a non-default group

timeline.message: Allow running the Docker image with a non-default group
Docker tests fixes on Linux in CI and Vagrant

timeline.bodyText: Should we enforce this in running the image itself?
timeline.author: rjernst

replies.bodyText:
According to the docker run documentation, you have to specify the user or UID, so I don't believe that's necessary.
Arguably the API for this test code is weak in that it allows you to pass a null uid and a non-null gid, but I felt it was overkill to introduce something more robust here.
replies.author: pugnascotia
